EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-01-18-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Jacksonville.ES-2018-01-11.EMAIL - Execut
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Cisco & My Turbonomic Team at TPC Sawgrass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On Thursday, January 18th, the green at TPC Sawgrass will be frequented by your technology peers for an afternoon of food, drinks, and of course, golf, with Turbonomic and Cisco while we take on the Dye Valley Course. Whether you are customer today or still considering becoming a part of the family, I hope you will join me for this fun event to get to know our community.
Jacksonville Community Lunch & Golf <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
Where: TPC Sawgrass 110 Championship Way, Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida 32082 Tuesday, January 18th 11:30am
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
Please note that slots for this event are limited and filling up fast. Reserve your spot today! <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
I hope to see you there,
Dave Kranowitz Vice President, Turbonomic
